data.title: Matthew Settle Tells OK! That His Divorce Is "A Tragedy"
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Just hours after the news broke that Gossip Girl star Matthew Settle has broken up with his wife, he told OK! that the split is a "tragedy."

Rumors had been swirling that Matthew and Naama Nativ, his wife of four years, had gone their separate ways.

But this afternoon a rep for the couple announced that they are, in fact, heading for a divorce.

READ WHAT MATTHEW HAS TOLD OK! IN THE PAST ABOUT HIS FAMILY LIFE

At the G-Star Raw fashion show at New York's Hammerstein Ballroom today, OK! asked Matthew how he is adjusting to single life.

"I'm not. I'm not adjusted yet," said Matthew, who plays Rufus Humphrey — the father of Penn Badgley's character, Dan — on the show.

HOT GALLERY: BLAKE AND CHACE SOAK UP THE MIAMI SIGHTS

"I'm still working on that, but it's always a tragedy when things happen, and that's all I can say."
